/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. A red truck, vibrant against the muted colors of the surroundings, is in motion on the right side of the road. The road itself is bordered by a concrete barrier on the left, providing a sense of safety and order. On the right side of the road, a line of trees stands tall, their green foliage adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Above, the sky is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the trees and gives a sense of depth to the scene. The overall composition of the image suggests a typical day in a bustling city, where nature and urban life coexist.
